articles.title: Spain's prime minister joins foreign leaders concerned with Musk's interest in European politics - The Associated Press
articles.description: Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez has joined European leaders who are are voicing concerns that Elon Musk is trying to influence politics across the Atlantic after helping Donald Trump return to the White House. Sánchez, a leading European socialist, told …
articles.content: MADRID (AP) Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez criticized Elon Musk on Wednesday as he joined European leaders who are are voicing concerns that the immensely wealthy backer of U.S. President-elect… [+1742 chars]
